source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'TGR % spCon %'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0

properties.description: sums four columns from Estate sheet for each TM model

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Version as string,
		Fund as string,
		Asset as string,
		Period as string,
		PlunitID as string,
		Plunit as string,
		OriginID as string,
		Origin as string,
		SpeciesID as string,
		Species as string,
		PerpetualArea as string,
		CurrentArea as string,
		FutureArea as string,
		Disposed as string,
		Acquired as string,
		PerpetualFinalFell as string,
		CurrentFinalFell as string,
		FutureFinalFell as string,
		PerpetualLand as string,
		CurrentLand as string,
		FutureLand as string,
		PerpetualRental as string,
		CurrentRental as string,
		FutureRental as string,
		PerpetualOverhead as string,
		CurrentOverhead as string,
		FutureOverhead as string,
		PerpetualRates as string,
		CurrentRates as string,
		FutureRates as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ForestModel
ForestModel select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		Period,
		PerpetualArea,
		PerpetualFinalFell,
		PerpetualLand,
		PerpetualRental,
		PerpetualOverhead,
		PerpetualRates
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ForestModelColumns
NumericValues aggregate(groupBy(Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		Period),
	PerpetualArea = sum(PerpetualArea),
		PerpetualFinalFell = sum(PerpetualFinalFell),
		PerpetualLand = sum(PerpetualLand),
		PerpetualRental = sum(PerpetualRental),
		PerpetualOverhead = sum(PerpetualOverhead),
		PerpetualRates = sum(PerpetualRates)) ~> ColumnSums
Unpivot1 derive(Status = 'Estate_Calcs') ~> AddStatus
ForestModelColumns derive(PerpetualArea = toDouble(PerpetualArea),
		PerpetualFinalFell = toDouble(PerpetualFinalFell),
		PerpetualLand = toDouble(PerpetualLand),
		PerpetualRental = toDouble(PerpetualRental),
		PerpetualOverhead = toDouble(PerpetualOverhead),
		PerpetualRates = toDouble(PerpetualRates)) ~> NumericValues
ColumnSums unpivot(output(
		Product as string,
		Perpetual as double
	),
	ungroupBy(Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		Period),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
AddStatus sink(input(
		Period as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as string,
		Curent_Amount as string,
		Future_Amount as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Version_name as string,
		UOM as string,
		Share_Perpetual as string,
		Entity as string,
		Destination as string,
		Category as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Period,
		Status,
		Product,
		Perpetual_Amount = Perpetual,
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		Version_name = Version
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DBStaging

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Period_Date as timestamp,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		Entity as string,
		Category as string,
		Destination as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Current_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Future_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Share_Perpetual as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string,
		UOM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT \n --REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS REF_ASSET_OFFSET , PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS PAR_ASSET_OFFSET, PAR.DESC_YEAR, DAT.PERIOD,\n CASE WHEN REF.ASSET_OFFSET = PAR.ASSET_OFFSET \n          THEN DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)+( CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) - 1 ),CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n          ELSE DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)-CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)+( CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) - 1 ),CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n END AS Period_Date,\n REF.FUND_ID AS Fund_ID,\n REF.ASSET_ID AS Asset_ID,\n DAT.STATUS AS Status, \n DAT.PRODUCT AS Product, \n DAT.ENTITY AS Entity,\n DAT.CATEGORY AS Category,\n DAT.Destination AS Destination,\n CASE WHEN PRD.GL_CODE IS NULL THEN \'IGNORE\' ELSE PRD.GL_CODE END AS GL_Code,\n CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(100)) AS Cash_Flow_Code,\n CASE WHEN DAT.[Status] = \'Estate_Calcs\' THEN CAST(CAST(DAT.PERPETUAL_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ELSE\n ABS(( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) )) END AS Perpetual_Amount,\n CASE WHEN DAT.[Status] = \'Estate_Calcs\' THEN 0 ELSE CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) END AS Current_Amount, \n CASE WHEN DAT.[Status] = \'Estate_Calcs\' THEN 0 ELSE CAST(CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) END AS Future_Amount,\n CAST(CAST(DAT.SHARE_PERPETUAL AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) AS Share_Perpetual,\n CASE WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'DR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\'\n      WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'DR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) < 0 THEN \'CR\'\n	  WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'CR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'CR\'\n	  WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'CR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) < 0 THEN \'DR\'\n	  WHEN COA.DEBIT_CREDIT IS NULL AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\'\n	  ELSE \'CR\'\n END AS Debit_Credit,\n-- CASE WHEN ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\' ElSE \'CR\' END AS Debit_Credit,\n \'Forecast\' AS Forecast_Type,\n REF.VERSION_NAME AS Version_name,\n DAT.UOM\nFROM RELATIONAL.FORECAST_ASSET_REFERENCE REF\nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_PARAM PAR\nON REF.FUND_ID = PAR.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = PAR.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = PAR.VERSION_NAME \nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_DATA DAT\nON REF.FUND_ID = DAT.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = DAT.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = DAT.VERSION_NAME \nLEFT JOIN RELATIONAL.FORECAST_GL_PRODUCT_MAP PRD\nON DAT.FUND_ID = PRD.FUND_ID AND DAT.ASSET_ID = PRD.ASSET_ID AND DAT.STATUS = PRD.STATUS AND DAT.PRODUCT = PRD.Product AND PRD.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0\nLEFT JOIN RELATIONAL.CHART_OF_ACCOUNT COA\nON PRD.GL_CODE = COA.GL_CODE AND COA.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0\nWHERE REF.ISPROCESSED = 0 AND REF.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0 \nAND DAT.STATUS != \'\' AND DAT.STATUS IS NOT NULL\nAND CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT) >= CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
StagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Period_Date,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Perpetual_Amount,
		Current_Amount,
		Future_Amount,
		Share_Perpetual,
		Debit_Credit,
		Forecast_Type,
		Version_name,
		UOM,
		Entity,
		Category,
		Destination
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
AddAuditColumns alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0))) ~> AlterRowInsert
AlterRowInsert sink(input(
		Period_Date as timestamp,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Current_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Future_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string,
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		UOM as string,
		CPM_Code as string,
		Share_Perpetual as decimal(25,10),
		Entity as string,
		Destination as string,
		Category as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Period_Date,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Perpetual_Amount,
		Current_Amount,
		Future_Amount,
		Share_Perpetual,
		Debit_Credit,
		Forecast_Type,
		Version_name,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		UOM,
		Entity,
		Category,
		Destination
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Validation_Error as string,
		Minor_CARS as string,
		Major_CARS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID_Old as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Minor_CARS as integer,
		Major_CARS as integer,
		Certification_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalCertification
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		StagingChecksum,
		Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalCertification derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Certification_Type_Code,Certification_Number,Next_Audit_Date,Certifying_Body,Certification_Date,Certification_End_Date,Certified_Entity,Minor_CARS,Major_CARS)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Certification_ID = Certification_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code,
		Relation_Certification_Number = Certification_Number,
		Relation_Next_Audit_Date = Next_Audit_Date,
		Relation_Certifying_Body = Certifying_Body,
		Relation_Certification_Date = Certification_Date,
		Relation_Certification_End_Date = Certification_End_Date,
		Relation_Certified_Entity = Certified_Entity,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum,
		Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndID derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Certification_Type_Code,Certification_Number,Next_Audit_Date,Certifying_Body,Certification_Date,Certification_End_Date,Certified_Entity,Minor_CARS,Major_CARS)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Certification_ID == Relation_Certification_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingCertification@NewCertification select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Minor_CARS = NewAndExistingCertification@NewCertification@Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS = NewAndExistingCertification@NewCertification@Major_CARS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Next_Audit_Date = toDate(Next_Audit_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Certification_ID = toInteger(Certification_ID),
		Certification_Date = toDate(Certification_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Certification_End_Date = toDate(Certification_End_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy")) ~> ConvertDatesAndID
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingCertification@(NewCertification, ChangedCertification, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingCertification@ChangedCertification derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID = Relation_Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name,
		Minor_CARS = NewAndExistingCertification@ChangedCertification@Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS = NewAndExistingCertification@ChangedCertification@Major_CARS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Minor_CARS as integer,
		Major_CARS as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Certification_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name,
		Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS
	)) ~> UpserttRow

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_name as string,
		Currency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_alloc_percentage as string,
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string,
		RH_Level_1 as string,
		RH_Level_2 as string,
		RH_Level_3 as string,
		RH_Level_4 as string,
		RH_Level_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
GetFirstRowPerAssetFundCombo select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_name,
		Currency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_alloc_percentage,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company,
		RH_Level_1,
		RH_Level_2,
		RH_Level_3,
		RH_Level_4,
		RH_Level_5
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB window(over(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID),
	asc(Asset_ID, false),
	asc(Fund_ID, false),
	RN = rowNumber()) ~> AnalyticFunctionComputeRowOrder
AnalyticFunctionComputeRowOrder filter(RN==1) ~> GetFirstRowPerAssetFundCombo
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string,
		RH_Level_1 as string,
		RH_Level_2 as string,
		RH_Level_3 as string,
		RH_Level_4 as string,
		RH_Level_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name = Asset_name,
		Asset_Curency = Currency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per = Asset_alloc_percentage,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company,
		RH_Level_1,
		RH_Level_2,
		RH_Level_3,
		RH_Level_4,
		RH_Level_5
	)) ~> StagingDB

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records may or may not be from current reporting period but the certification ids are assumed not null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Certification_Type as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS as string,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOpsCertificationType
LookupCertificationType derive(CertificationTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Certification_Type_Code_Lkp), "Certification Type", ""),
		CertificationEndDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Certification_End_Date), "Certification End Date", ""),
		ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Certification_ID),"Null Certification ID for non-current Reporting Period","")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',CertificationTypeValidateMsg,CertificationEndDateValidateMsg,ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concatWS("/", CertificationTypeValidateMsg, CertificationEndDateValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Validation_Flag,
		Certification_Type,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		RowNumber,
		Certification_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Certification_Type_Lkp,
		CertificationTypeValidateMsg,
		CertificationEndDateValidateMsg,
		ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Certification_ID = toInteger(Certification_ID),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Next_Audit_Date = toDate(Next_Audit_Date),
		Certification_Date = toDate(Certification_Date),
		Certification_End_Date = toDate(Certification_End_Date),
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS = toInteger(Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS),
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS = toInteger(Number_of_Open_Major_CARS),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOpsCertificationType select(mapColumn(
		Certification_Type_Code_Lkp = Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Type_Lkp = Certification_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCertificationTypeLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectCertificationTypeLkp lookup(Certification_Type == Certification_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(Certification_Type_Code_Lkp, false),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCertificationType
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(iif(Reporting_Period == CurrentReportingPeriod, true(), false()),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Minor_CARS as integer,
		Major_CARS as integer,
		Source_File as string,
		Source_Sub_File as string,
		Error_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Minor_CARS = Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS = Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset sink(input(
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Asset_Id as string,
		Fund_Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Asset_Id = Asset_ID,
		Fund_Id = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OpsWorkbookWorksheetList
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate

parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS as integer,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS as integer,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational

parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS as integer,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS as integer,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceUpdate
SourceUpdate select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(Certification_ID)))) ~> AlterRowUpdate
AlterRowUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Certification_ID'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational
